special_notes: Full rules: Follow the syntax pattern.  The letter 'O' is blocky and the number '0' is more oblong.  Key all verticals except "TRUCK" & "ARK" as seen Vertical characters must be entered as seen.

stacked_character_rules.position: Y - OMIT ARK verticals on left side of plate.; Y - Verticals on right are NOT keyed.
